abstract: New requirements announced on Friday effectively leave the American contractor’s F-35A stealth jet as the only viable option.
snippet: New requirements announced on Friday effectively leave the American contractor’s F-35A stealth jet as the only viable option.
lead_paragraph: SEOUL, South Korea — South Korea on Friday announced revised requirements for a new generation of fighter jets it plans to buy, effectively leaving Lockheed Martin’s F-35A stealth jet as the only viable bidder for the country’s largest arms acquisition program ever.

headline.main: South Korea Is Expected to Buy Lockheed Fighter Jets
headline.print_headline: Lockheed Is Expected to Win Contract for South Korea’s Fighter Jets

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: European Aeronautic Defense and Space Co
